00048 /*****************************************************************************
00049  * mia_opti.h                                                                *
00050  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
00051  *  Description:                                                             *
00052  *      Performs machine level code optimization:                            *
00053  *      1) common subexpression ellimination                                 *
00054  *      2) limited copy propogation (only R-R, R-M, M-R, M-M)                *
00055  *      3) dead code removal (unused operations, src1=dest)                  *
00056  *                                                                           *
00057  *      This code is base-lined off the work developed by Scott Mahlke in    *
00058  *      l_basic_opti.c                                                       *
00059  *                                                                           *
00060  * AUTHORS: R.A. Bringmann                                                   *
00061  *****************************************************************************/
00062 /* 09/17/02 REK Adding declaration for M_local_constant_folding. */
